import React, { useState } from 'react' import SignInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Login' import PersonIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Person' import LockIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Lock' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAppDispatch, useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks' const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({email: '', password: ''}) const { email, password } = formData; const { user, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, message } = useAppSelector((state) => state.auth) const onChange = (e: { target: { name: string, value: string } }) => { setFormData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } return (

Login

Create Account

Need Help?

) } export default Login
